p: For healthy horses, 100 × 10 6 ASCs were injected in 5 mL of sterile saline either AO or LS (depending on the group, n = 3 each) immediately following CSF collection. One horse in each group received Tc-labeled ASCs and one horse was injected AO with free label (Tc-HMPAO without ASCs; control) after the study was completed.
